metadata.synopsis: An Italian nobleman seeks help after his paralyzed daughter becomes possessed by the spirit of a malevolent ancestress.

reviews: Now von Trier's trying his hand at the horror porn genre without abandoning the genital close-ups, making Antichrist a sort of horror porn squared.
O nico elemento que merece elogios, nesta cpia pattica de O Exorcista,  a bela Carla Gravina; o resto deve ser exorcizado de nossas memrias.
It involves Satan, a possessed woman's tongue and a billy goat's butthole. Again, the distinction between scary and unpleasant becomes revoltingly clear.
